Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Householder \House"hold`er\, n. The master or head of a family; one who occupies a house with his family. [1913 Webster]
Towns in which almost every householder was an English Protestant. --Macaulay. [1913 Webster]
{Compound householder}. See {Compound}, a. [1913 Webster]
householder n : someone who owns a home [syn: {homeowner}]
